skins.shipDescription: First ship of the Aoba-class heavy cruisers, Aoba.
skins.selfIntroduction: Hai hai! The name's Aoba! I spent most of my days in the 6th Fleet, took part in many battles with my sisters, and did my best to survive until the end. Let's drop this boring topic, shall we? I was a writer for the Navy once, so I've picked up a thing or two. Commander, anything juicy going on around you lately?
skins.acquisition: Hmm, hmm... I can smell it. This fleet is going to make the headlines! So you're the Commander, huh? Just let me, Aoba, gather all the information without holding back!
skins.details: What's up? You know I charge for intel.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I believe that hard work pays off, you know. Eh? Why was I following you yesterday? I don't ever recall doing anything like that~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Say, Commander. If you let me interview you, I'll share some juicy gossip with you. Like... which girls might be looking your way~
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's sure hard getting a scoop... Maybe... I should make some news myself!
skins.secretaryTouch: Ah, a good idea, finally! This will definitely make the front page!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander... It's not wise to mess with reporters.
